name: /r/homestuck Discord Server Advanced Tags by aviaryDestruction
tagline: A repository for all the custom @42 tags @aviaryDestruction wrote.
body:
## Welcome to the /r/homestuck Discord Server Tags
Sup douchebags.

## Tutorials on how to use ma tags
# +t shitscore

You put in *+t shitscore [PERSON 1]  [PERSON 2] [OPTIONAL PERSON]*. And then @42 will output this:

**=====SHITSCORING=====**
*[PERSON 1]*^
*(THE QUADRANT)^^
*[PERSON 2]*^^^

(THE BOT'S COMMENT)^^^^
**=====SHITSCORING=====**

^This line will be the [PERSON 1] you put earlier. If you put nothing for the [PERSON 1], the bot will generate a random user for you.
^^This line will be the QUADRANT which defines the shitship.
^^^This line will be the [PERSON 2] you put earlier. If you put nothing for the [PERSON 2], the bot will take your username instead.
^^^^This line will be the COMMENT on the ship.

**====NOTES!!!====**
The [PERSON]s can't be multi-worded, unless ?ou put quotes around them.
[OPTIONAL PERSON] is only used for Auspisticism (or as 42 calls it, Ausspississm), you can leave it blank, it will generate a random user.

**====EXAMPLE====**
*+t shitscore AndrewHussie*
The bot will reply with:
**=====SHITSCORING=====**
*AndrewHussie*
{set:skore;{choose:? 'Kismitude';? 'Maspritship';? 'Moralliance';? 'Aussipississm'
The Asshole Between Them 
-={user}=-;};}
{skore}

*Your Username*

14% Where'd you get this ship? The thrift store?
**=====SHITSCORING=====**

# +t blackmarket
Just put in *+t blackmarket [THING]* in and it'll score how much [THING] is worth on the black market.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
